001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.historyLog;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.HistoryLogProps;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.AlarmStatusResponse;
007
008@HistoryLogProps(
009    opCode = 28,
010    displayName = "Alarm Cleared",
011    internalName = "LID_ALARM_CLEARED"
012)
013public class AlarmClearedHistoryLog extends HistoryLog {
014
015    private long alarmId;
016
017    public AlarmClearedHistoryLog() {}
018    public AlarmClearedHistoryLog(long pumpTimeSec, long sequenceNum, long alarmId) {
019        super(pumpTimeSec, sequenceNum);
020        this.cargo = buildCargo(pumpTimeSec, sequenceNum, alarmId);
021        this.alarmId = alarmId;
022
023    }
024
025    public AlarmClearedHistoryLog(long alarmId) {
026        this(0, 0, alarmId);
027    }
028
029    public int typeId() {
030        return 28;
031    }
032
033    /**
034     * <table border="1">
035     * <caption>Parsed fields for AlarmClearedHistoryLog:</caption>
036     * <tr><td><code>alarmId</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readUint32(raw, 10)</code></td></tr>
037     * </table>
038     */
039    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
040        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == 26);
041        this.cargo = raw;
042        parseBase(raw);
043        this.alarmId = Bytes.readUint32(raw, 10);
044
045    }
046
047    public static byte[] buildCargo(long pumpTimeSec, long sequenceNum, long alarmId) {
048        return HistoryLog.fillCargo(Bytes.combine(
049            new byte[]{28, 0},
050            Bytes.toUint32(pumpTimeSec),
051            Bytes.toUint32(sequenceNum),
052            Bytes.toUint32(alarmId)));
053    }
054
055    public long getAlarmId() {
056        return alarmId;
057    }
058
059    public AlarmStatusResponse.AlarmResponseType getAlarmResponseType() {
060        return AlarmStatusResponse.AlarmResponseType.fromSingularId(alarmId);
061    }
062}
